column4: I upgraded from 6.06 to 6.10 on the weekend, and I'm getting weird xinerama behavior with metacity --- it won't let me drag windows completely off my primary display...  I've switched to xfwm4 temporarily, but I'd rather figure out how to fix metacity.   It was working fine in 6.06...
xserver driver?  any other apparent issues?  do you see the window appear on the other screen?
I don't think it's an X issue - using xfwm4 everything seems fine...
ok, great.  hope you can fix it.
